name: Freddy Froblin and the Lost Totem
name_original: Freddy Froblin and the Lost Totem
description:
Freddy Froblin and the Lost Totem

The Frog Mayor's Totem has gone missing! Will Freddy be able to find it and restore peace to the land?

This is my game made for my 2018 Bitsy Secret Santa, Em. My 3 prompt words were:

  • Frogs
  • Goblins
  • Froblins

Credits to Adam for the Bitsy tool, Mildmojo for the end from dialogue hack, and Emma for organizing the Secret Santa.
